items.content: Hi there! I'm Buddy, your friendly talking watch! I can answer questions about anything in a super fun way! What would you like to know today?
Volcanoes are like Earth's pressure cookers! Hot melted rock called magma builds up under the ground, and when there's too much pressure - BOOM! The magma shoots up through the volcano as lava!
Lava is super hot because it comes from deep inside Earth where everything is heated up by the planet's core! It can be as hot as 2,200 degrees - that's hotter than your oven could ever get!
Can I draw a picture of a volcano?
Yes! Drawing a volcano would be awesome! You could make the mountain shape, then add red and orange lava coming out the top. Maybe even add some smoke clouds too!
